scripts.docker:preview: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -it -p 3001:3001 -v $PWD/out:/usr/src/app/out remotion-nixos
scripts.docker:preview:live: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -it -p 3001:3001 -v $PWD:/usr/src/app -v $PWD/out:/usr/src/app/out remotion-nixos npm run dev
scripts.docker:render: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -v $PWD/out:/usr/src/app/out remotion-nixos npx remotion render
scripts.startall: docker image prune -f && docker builder prune -f && npm run docker:preview:live
